commentary_sequence.speaker: Analyst
commentary_sequence.text: Well, the Panthers got off to a quick start, potting five already. Oilers answering with four of their own. This could be a track meet, folks!

commentary_sequence.speaker: Host
commentary_sequence.text: Absolutely. And right off the bat, we saw Barkov take that opening faceoff against Draisaitl. Sets the tone early for Florida.

commentary_sequence.speaker: Analyst
commentary_sequence.text: Key matchup there. If the Oilers want to claw back, Draisaitl's gotta win those battles in the dot.
